summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to prosecutors and her co-counsel, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (a reply regarding a continuance) in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It demonstrates routine legal communication in the ongoing prosecution.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: The sender of the email, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (a reply regarding a continuance) on behalf of the defense in the Maxwell case.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Copied on the email as part of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger

events.title: Filing of Reply re Continuance in Maxwell Case
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim files a reply regarding a continuance in the criminal case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations.address: 33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
locations.context: The business address for the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, though noted as closed due to Covid-19.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Ghislaine Maxwell's lead defense attorney, Bobbi C. Sternheim, to prosecutors and her co-counsel.
It transmits a courtesy copy of a court filing titled 'Maxwell_Reply_re-_Continuance.pdf', indicating ongoing pre-trial motions regarding scheduling in the criminal case.
The email shows the composition of Maxwell's defense legal team at this time (April 2021), including Sternheim, Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
The communication is routine legal correspondence, demonstrating the procedural aspects of the high-profile prosecution.
